channels_info.name: Human Design Channels
channels_info.description: The 36 channels connecting gates and centers in Human Design
channels_info.purpose: Channels create defined energy flows between centers
channels_info.activation: Both gates must be activated to create a defined channel
channels_info.source: Human Design System by Ra Uru Hu

Individual.description: Mutation and empowerment - unique individual expression

Tribal.description: Support and resources - caring for the tribe

1-8.name: Channel of Inspiration
1-8.description: The channel of creative inspiration and individual expression. Brings unique creative energy to inspire others.
1-8.gate_1: The Creative - Self-expression and individual purpose
1-8.energy_flow: Creative self-expression (1) flows to unique contribution (8)
1-8.when_defined: Natural creative inspiration and ability to inspire others

2-14.name: Channel of the Beat
2-14.description: The channel of direction and life force energy. Knows the direction and has the energy to pursue it.
2-14.gate_2: The Receptive - Direction of the self
2-14.gate_14: Power Skills - Possession in great measure
2-14.energy_flow: Direction (2) is powered by life force energy (14)
2-14.when_defined: Natural sense of direction with energy to pursue it
challenges: Pressure to always know the direction

3-60.name: Channel of Mutation
3-60.description: The channel of mutation and innovation. Brings energy for change and new beginnings.
3-60.energy_flow: Innovation (3) is grounded by acceptance of limitations (60)
3-60.when_defined: Natural ability to innovate and create change

7-31.name: Channel of the Alpha
7-31.description: The channel of leadership and democratic guidance. Natural leaders who guide through influence.
7-31.gate_7: The Army - The role of the self in interaction
7-31.when_defined: Natural leadership abilities and influential presence

9-52.name: Channel of Concentration
9-52.description: The channel of focus and determination. Ability to concentrate energy on what matters.
9-52.gate_9: Focus - The power of the small
9-52.when_defined: Natural ability to focus and complete projects

Manifesting.description: Channels connecting motor centers to throat

Generating.description: Channels connecting sacral to other centers

practical_applications.chart_reading: Defined channels show consistent energy themes
practical_applications.life_purpose: Channels indicate natural talents and abilities
practical_applications.career: Channels suggest optimal work environments and roles
practical_applications.personal_development: Understanding channels helps optimize energy use
